title: Launcher not showing up
body:
I just installed windows 7 32bit on my pc, and I downloaded the LoL Installer. Installing was fine, but when I click the LoL icon it just shows the League of Legends logo and the loading bar. After the loading bar goes off, the logo disappears and launcher doesn't appear. The processes are still running
I have tried:
-Deleting lol_launcher and lol_patcher
-Disabling UAC
-Running as admin

I can't do anything because I don't have all the folders in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

this is all I have: 
https://gyazo.com/cf19b46dce0b6ec648dc348b77bf6a42

replies.body: This issue is likely due to a security setting blocking the patcher from launching and scanning your game files.  You've started some solid steps in the right track, but it's important to go through each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well.  This will help make sure that league is being added as an exception.  Let me know if you have any questions!
